function: Render an interactive Wheel of Fortune interface allowing users to spin the wheel and see results via realistic animation.
static_description: The main area features a large circular wheel centered on screen with segments representing different prizes. Each segment includes a label and icon from the prize data. Below the wheel is a prominent 'SPIN' button styled in dark red. Background is light gray (#f0f0f0).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the SPIN button initiates the wheel rotation animation with sound effect. Button becomes disabled during spin. After completion, result displays briefly before navigating to win confirmation modal or updating UI accordingly.
Hovering over the SPIN button slightly increases its scale and adds a subtle shadow for feedback.
